shotify.share.twitter.content: Look at this screenshot I took on Minecraft!
shotify.config.title: Shotify
shotify.config.copy_screenshot.name: Automatic Gopy Screenshot to Clipboard
shotify.config.copy_screenshot.descripti: Automagically copies the Screenshot to the clipboard.
shotify.config.open_folder_button.name: Show Open Folder Button
shotify.config.open_folder_button.descri: Whether or not to show the Open Folder button.

shotify.config.open_image_button.descrip: Whether or not to show the Open Image button.

shotify.config.render_preview.name: Render Preview
shotify.config.preview_direction.name: Preview Direction
shotify.config.preview_direction.descrip: What corner of the screen to minimize the preview to.
shotify.config.preview_time.name: Preview Time
shotify.config.preview_time.description: How long to show the screenshot preview.

shotify.config.upload_imgur.description: Automagically uploads the screenshot to Imgur.
shotify.config.copy_upload.name: Automatic Copy URL to Clipboard
shotify.config.copy_upload.description: Automagically copies the URL to the clipboard.
shotify.config.copy_url_button.name: Show Copy URL Button
